head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Man Killed In Hit-Run Accident

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Man Killed In Hit-Run Accident

block.p: A Brooklyn man was killed when he was struck by a car while crossing East 22nd Street early yesterday morning, the police said. The man, Matthew Hopkins, 26, of Montgomery Street, was crossing near the intersection of Park Avenue South about 4:09 a.m. when he was hit by a 1991 Honda, which continued without stopping, the police said. No arrests had been made yesterday evening.
